content:
Yes, there are several popular video game characters that were originally comic book characters. Here are some examples:

1. Lara Croft: The Tomb Raider video game series was inspired by a comic book series called Tomb Raider: The Series.

2. Mega Man: The Mega Man video game series was based on a Japanese comic book series called Rockman.

3. Rayman: The Rayman video game series was inspired by a French comic book series called Rayman, which was co-created by the game's creator, Michel Ancel.

4. Street Fighter: The Street Fighter video game series was inspired by a Japanese manga series called Street Fighter II.

5. Castlevania: The Castlevania video game series was loosely based on the Japanese horror manga, Demon Castle Dracula.

These are just a few examples, there are many other video game characters that were originally comic book characters or were influenced by them.
